summary: A trader and his daughter set off in search of the fabled graveyard of the elephants in deepest Africa, only to encounter a wild man raised by apes.
cast: Johnny Weissmuller|Neil Hamilton|C. Aubrey Smith|Maureen O'Sullivan|Doris Lloyd|Forrester Harvey|Ivory Williams|Franz Balluck|Charles Becker|Eddie Buresh|Ray Corrigan|Billy Curtis|Johnny Eck|Joseph Herbst|Johnny Leal|Jack Leonard|Angelo Rossitto|Tanner|Gus Wayne|Johnny Winters
